title: Dera Ismail Khan Division
text:
Dera Ismail Khan Division was an administrative <a href="Divisions%20of%20Pakistan">division</a> of <a href="Khyber%20Pakhtunkhwa">Khyber Pakhtunkhwa</a> Province, <a href="Pakistan">Pakistan</a>, until the reforms of 2000 abolished the third tier of government. Until the 1990s it also contained <a href="Bannu%20Division">Bannu Division</a>.
Districts.
At abolition it contained the following districts:
